title: Tyga parties with bikini-clad girls on luxury yacht after Kylie Jenner drama
text:
Tyga is truly living his best life in Australia (Picture: Getty / Backgrid)

Tyga really is making the most of his single life, after he found himself linked back to ex-girlfriend Kylie Jenner.

In fact, the 29-year-old invited around 20 women to party with him on board a swanky yacht in the sun-soaked Sydney Harbour on Tuesday, amid his Australia and New Zealand tour.

While his new pals were dressed to the nines, ready for a day on the water – opting for bikinis and colourful dresses – the Rack City rapper rocked a black hoodie and a basketball cap for the day out.

He finished the look off with a pair of pattered purple trousers.

Because nothing quite says spring in Australia like donning a huge hoodie and purple trousers.

We’re getting a sweat on just looking at him…

Tyga was joined by around 20 women on board the luxury yacht (Picture: Backgrid)

Tyga is clearly enjoying his time down under (Picture: Backgrid)

Tyga recently made headlines after he was dragged into Kylie Jenner’s split drama with Travis Scott at the beginning of the month.

Advertisement

Advertisement

It all kicked off when the 22-year-old was spotted visiting the hotel where he happened to be recording new music, alongside two pals – just hours after news of her split emerged.

In photos obtained by the Mail Online, Ky was spotted outside the Sunset Marquis, accompanied by pals Anastasia “Stassi” Karanikolaou and Kelsey Calemine, whom she had earlier partied with at the West Hollywood club Delilah until 2am.

Tyga was recently linked back to Kylie Jenner (Picture: Instagram)

Kylie and Tyga split in 2017 (Picture: Getty)

The Keeping Up With the Kardashians star is thought to have stayed for around an hour, before heading home.

But Ky was having none of the rumours, and insisted nothing actually went down that night.

She tweeted: ‘The internet makes everything 100 times more dramatic than what it really is.

‘There was no “2am date with Tyga”. You see me drop two of my friends off at a studio that he happened to be at.

‘Travis and I are on great terms and our main focus right now is Stormi our friendship and our daughter is priority (sic).’

So, that’s that then.

Got a showbiz story? If you've got a story, video or pictures get in touch with the Metro.co.uk Entertainment team by emailing us celebtips@metro.co.uk, calling 020 3615 2145 or by visiting our Submit Stuff page - we'd love to hear from you.

description: Tyga really is making the most of his single life in Australia, after he found himself linked back to ex-girlfriend Kylie Jenner.
